sentences.zh: 昔自在古，歷建正作於孟春。

translations.literal: Formerly in ancient times, calendar established correct made at first spring.
translations.idiomatic: In ancient times, the calendar established the correct beginning in the first month of spring.

sentences.zh: 於時冰泮發蟄，百草奮興，秭鳺先滜。

translations.literal: At that time ice melts awakens hibernating, hundred grasses vigorously arise, nest duck first swims.
translations.idiomatic: At that time the ice melts and hibernating creatures awaken, the hundred grasses vigorously arise, the nest duck swims first.

sentences.zh: 物乃歲具，生於東，次順四時，卒于冬分。

translations.literal: Things then year complete, born from east, next follows four seasons, ends at winter division.
translations.idiomatic: Things are then complete for the year, born from the east, next following the four seasons, ending at the winter solstice.

translations.literal: Time rooster three calls, ends bright.
translations.idiomatic: The rooster calls three times, and daylight ends.

translations.literal: Strokes twelve month sections, ends at Chou.
translations.idiomatic: Following the twelve monthly sections, it ends at Chou.

translations.literal: Sun moon complete, therefore bright also.
translations.idiomatic: The sun and moon are complete, therefore it is bright.

sentences.zh: 明者孟也，幽者幼也，幽明者雌雄也。

translations.literal: Bright ones first also, dark ones young also, dark bright ones female male also.
translations.idiomatic: The bright are the first, the dark are the young, dark and bright are female and male.

sentences.zh: 雌雄代興，而順至正之統也。

translations.literal: Female male alternately flourish, and follows arrives correct rule also.
translations.idiomatic: Female and male alternately flourish, following the rule that arrives at correctness.

translations.literal: Sun returns to west, rises bright in east;
translations.idiomatic: The sun returns to the west, brightness rises in the east;

translations.literal: Moon returns to east, rises bright in west.
translations.idiomatic: The moon returns to the east, brightness rises in the west.

sentences.zh: 正不率天，又不由人，則凡事易壞而難成矣。

translations.literal: Correct not follows heaven, moreover not by human, then all affairs easy bad and difficult complete already.
translations.idiomatic: If the correct calendar does not follow heaven and is not set by humans, then all affairs will easily fail and be difficult to complete.

sentences.zh: 王者易姓受命，必慎始初，改正朔，易服色，推本天元，順承厥意。

translations.literal: Kings change surname receive mandate, must careful beginnings initial, correct new moon, change clothing colors, trace root heaven origin, comply receive their intention.
translations.idiomatic: When kings change their surname and receive the mandate, they must be careful about beginnings and origins, correct the new moon, change clothing colors, trace back to heaven's origin, and comply with receiving its intention.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：神農以前尚矣。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Shennong before still remote.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: Before Shennong it is still too remote.

sentences.zh: 蓋黃帝考定星歷，建立五行，起消息，正閏餘，於是有天地神祇物類之官，是謂五官。

translations.literal: Indeed Yellow Emperor examined fixed star calendar, established five phases, raised wax wane, corrected intercalary remainder, thereupon had heaven earth spirits deities things categories officials, this called five officials.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed the Yellow Emperor examined and fixed the stellar calendar, established the five phases, set up waxing and waning, corrected the intercalary remainder. Thereupon there were officials for heaven, earth, spirits, deities, and categories of things - these are called the five officials.

translations.literal: Each governs their sequence, not mutually chaotic also.
translations.idiomatic: Each governs their proper sequence, without mutual confusion.

sentences.zh: 民是以能有信，神是以能有明德。

translations.literal: People thus able have trust, spirits thus able have bright virtue.
translations.idiomatic: The people thus are able to have trust, the spirits thus are able to have bright virtue.

sentences.zh: 民神異業，敬而不瀆，故神降之嘉生，民以物享，災禍不生，所求不匱。

translations.literal: People spirits different occupations, respect and not profane, therefore spirits descend auspicious births, people with things enjoy, disaster calamities not born, what sought not deficient.
translations.idiomatic: People and spirits have different occupations, they respect and do not profane, therefore the spirits descend auspicious births, the people enjoy with things, disasters and calamities are not born, what is sought is not deficient.

sentences.zh: 少暤氏之衰也，九黎亂德，民神雜擾，不可放物，禍菑薦至，莫盡其氣。

translations.literal: Shaohao clan of decline also, Nine Li chaotic virtue, people spirits mixed disturbance, cannot release things, calamities repeatedly arrive, not exhaust their qi.
translations.idiomatic: When the Shaohao clan declined, the Nine Li chaotic virtue, people and spirits mixed in disturbance, could not release things. Calamities repeatedly arrived, not exhausting their qi.

sentences.zh: 顓頊受之，乃命南正重司天以屬神，命火正黎司地以屬民，使復舊常，無相侵瀆。

translations.literal: Zhuanzu received it, thereupon commanded southern correct Chong govern heaven to belong spirits, commanded fire correct Li govern earth to belong people, made restore old constant, no mutually invade profane.
translations.idiomatic: Zhuanzu received it, thereupon commanded the southern official Chong to govern heaven and belong to the spirits, commanded the fire official Li to govern earth and belong to the people, made them restore the old constants, without mutually invading and profaning.

sentences.zh: 其後三苗服九黎之德，故二官咸廢所職，而閏餘乖次，孟陬殄滅，攝提無紀，歷數失序。

translations.literal: Their after Three Miao imitated Nine Li virtue, therefore two officials all abandoned their duties, and intercalary remainder wrong sequence, first month extinguished, Sheti no record, calendar numbers lost order.
translations.idiomatic: After that the Three Miao imitated the Nine Li's virtue, therefore both officials all abandoned their duties. The intercalary remainder was in wrong sequence, the first month extinguished, Sheti had no record, the calendar numbers lost order.

sentences.zh: 堯復遂重黎之後，不忘舊者，使復典之，而立羲和之官。

translations.literal: Yao again continued Chong Li descendants, not forgot old ones, made again manage it, and established Xi He officials.
translations.idiomatic: Yao again continued the descendants of Chong and Li, did not forget the old ones, made them again manage it, and established the Xi and He officials.

sentences.zh: 明時正度，則陰陽調，風雨節，茂氣至，民無夭疫。

translations.literal: Bright time correct measure, then yin yang harmonize, wind rain moderate, luxuriant qi arrives, people no premature epidemics.
translations.idiomatic: When times are bright and measures correct, then yin and yang harmonize, wind and rain are moderate, luxuriant qi arrives, the people have no premature epidemics.

sentences.zh: 年耆禪舜，申戒文祖，云「天之歷數在爾躬」。

translations.literal: Year old abdicated Shun, repeatedly admonished cultured ancestors, said "heaven calendar numbers in your person".
translations.idiomatic: When old in years, Yao abdicated to Shun, repeatedly admonished the cultured ancestors, saying 'Heaven's calendar numbers are in your person.'

translations.literal: Shun also with commanded Yu.
translations.idiomatic: Shun also commanded Yu with this.

translations.literal: From this observe it, kings what value also.
translations.idiomatic: From this observing it, this is what kings value.

sentences.zh: 夏正以正月，殷正以十二月，周正以十一月。

translations.literal: Xia calendar with first month, Yin calendar with twelfth month, Zhou calendar with eleventh month.
translations.idiomatic: The Xia calendar takes the first month, the Yin calendar takes the twelfth month, the Zhou calendar takes the eleventh month.

sentences.zh: 蓋三王之正若循環，窮則反本。

translations.literal: Indeed three kings calendar like cycle, exhausted then return root.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed the three kings' calendars are like a cycle - when exhausted they return to the root.

translations.literal: Realm has way, then not lose record sequence;
translations.idiomatic: When the realm has the way, it does not lose the record and sequence;

sentences.zh: 無道，則正朔不行於諸侯。

translations.literal: Without the Way, the correct calendar does not circulate among the feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: When there is no Way, the legitimate calendar is not followed by the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 幽、厲之後，周室微，陪臣執政，史不記時，君不告朔，故疇人子弟分散，或在諸夏，或在夷狄，是以其禨祥廢而不統。

translations.literal: You, Li after, Zhou chamber weak, attendant ministers seized government, historians not record time, lords not announce new moon, therefore calendar officials sons dispersed, some in various Xia, some in Yi Di, therefore their good omens abandoned and not united.
translations.idiomatic: After Kings You and Li, the Zhou chamber weakened, attendant ministers seized government, historians did not record time, lords did not announce the new moon. Therefore the calendar officials' sons dispersed, some in the various Xia states, some among the Yi and Di barbarians. Therefore their good omens were abandoned and not united.

sentences.zh: 周襄王二十六年閏三月，而春秋非之。

translations.literal: Zhou Xiang King twenty six year intercalary third month, and Spring Autumns criticized it.
translations.idiomatic: In the twenty-sixth year of King Xiang of Zhou, there was an intercalary third month, and the Spring and Autumn Annals criticized it.

sentences.zh: 先王之正時也，履端於始，舉正於中，歸邪於終。

translations.literal: Former kings correct time also, step beginning at start, raise correct at middle, return evil at end.
translations.idiomatic: The former kings' correction of time: step to the beginning at the start, raise the correct at the middle, return evil at the end.

translations.literal: Step beginning at start, sequence then not err;
translations.idiomatic: Step to the beginning at the start, the sequence then does not err;

translations.literal: Raise correct at middle, people then not confused;
translations.idiomatic: Raise the correct at the middle, the people then are not confused;

translations.literal: Return evil at end, affairs then not contrary.
translations.idiomatic: Return evil at the end, affairs then are not contrary.

sentences.zh: 其後戰國并爭，在於彊國禽敵，救急解紛而已，豈遑念斯哉！

translations.literal: Their after Warring States merged contended, existed in strong states capture enemies, save urgent resolve disputes only, how leisure think this!
translations.idiomatic: After that the Warring States merged and contended, it was about strong states capturing enemies, saving urgencies and resolving disputes only. How was there leisure to think of this!

sentences.zh: 是時獨有鄒衍，明於五德之傳，而散消息之分，以顯諸侯。

translations.literal: This time alone had Zou Yan, clear about five virtues transmission, and scattered wax wane divisions, to display feudal lords.
translations.idiomatic: At this time alone there was Zou Yan, who was clear about the transmission of the five virtues, and scattered the divisions of waxing and waning, to display to the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 而亦因秦滅六國，兵戎極煩，又升至尊之日淺，未暇遑也。

translations.literal: And also because Qin extinguished six states, weapons extremely troublesome, moreover ascended supreme days shallow, not leisure time also.
translations.idiomatic: And also because Qin had extinguished the six states, weapons were extremely troublesome, moreover the days of ascending to supremacy were few, there was no leisure time.

sentences.zh: 而亦頗推五勝，而自以為獲水德之瑞，更名河曰「德水」，而正以十月，色上黑。

translations.literal: And also somewhat extended five victories, and self considered obtained water virtue auspiciousness, changed name river called "virtue water", and calendar with tenth month, color top black.
translations.idiomatic: And also somewhat extended the five victories, and considered himself to have obtained the water virtue's auspiciousness, changed the river's name to 'Virtue Water', and took the tenth month for the calendar, with black as the top color.

sentences.zh: 然歷度閏餘，未能睹其真也。

translations.literal: Yet calendar measure intercalary remainder, not able see their truth also.
translations.idiomatic: Yet for calendar measures and intercalary remainder, he was not able to see their truth.

sentences.zh: 漢興，高祖曰「北畤待我而起」，亦自以為獲水德之瑞。

translations.literal: Han rose, Gaozu said "northern altar awaited me and arose", also self considered obtained water virtue auspiciousness.
translations.idiomatic: When the Han rose, Gaozu said 'The northern altar awaited me and arose,' and also considered himself to have obtained the water virtue's auspiciousness.

sentences.zh: 雖明習歷及張蒼等，咸以為然。

translations.literal: Though bright practiced calendar and Zhang Cang etc, all considered it so.
translations.idiomatic: Though those bright and practiced in the calendar like Zhang Cang and others, all considered it so.

sentences.zh: 是時天下初定，方綱紀大基，高后女主，皆未遑，故襲秦正朔服色。

translations.literal: This time realm newly settled, just establishing laws great foundation, Empress Gao female ruler, all not leisure, therefore inherited Qin calendar new moon clothing colors.
translations.idiomatic: At this time the realm was newly settled, just establishing laws and the great foundation. Empress Gao was female ruler, all had no leisure, therefore they inherited Qin's calendar, new moon, and clothing colors.

sentences.zh: 至孝文時，魯人公孫臣以終始五德上書，言「漢得土德，宜更元，改正朔，易服色。

translations.literal: Until Filial Wen time, Lu person Gongsun Chen with end beginning five virtues memorialized, said "Han obtained earth virtue, should change yuan, correct new moon, change clothing colors.
translations.idiomatic: Until Emperor Wen's time, the Lu person Gongsun Chen memorialized with the end and beginning five virtues, saying 'Han has obtained earth virtue, should change the yuan, correct the new moon, change clothing colors.'

translations.literal: Should have auspiciousness, auspiciousness yellow dragon appear".
translations.idiomatic: 'There should be auspiciousness, the auspiciousness being a yellow dragon appearing.'

sentences.zh: 事下丞相張蒼，張蒼亦學律歷，以為非是，罷之。

translations.literal: Matter sent down to Chancellor Zhang Cang, Zhang Cang also studied pitchpipes calendar, considered not correct, dismissed it.
translations.idiomatic: The matter was sent down to Chancellor Zhang Cang. Zhang Cang also studied pitchpipes and calendar, considered it not correct, and dismissed it.

sentences.zh: 其後黃龍見成紀，張蒼自黜，所欲論著不成。

translations.literal: Their after yellow dragon appeared Chengji, Zhang Cang self demoted, what desired discuss write not complete.
translations.idiomatic: After that a yellow dragon appeared in Chengji, Zhang Cang demoted himself, what he desired to discuss and write was not completed.

sentences.zh: 而新垣平以望氣見，頗言正歷服色事，貴幸，後作亂，故孝文帝廢不復問。

translations.literal: And Xinyuan Ping was seen through observing qi, extensively spoke of correcting calendar and clothing colors matters, was noble and favored. Later he made rebellion, therefore Emperor Wen abandoned it and did not inquire again.
translations.idiomatic: Xinyuan Ping gained favor by observing qi and spoke at length about correcting the calendar and clothing colors; he became noble and favored. Later he rebelled, so Emperor Wen abandoned the matter and never inquired about it again.

sentences.zh: 至今上即位，招致方士唐都，分其天部；

translations.literal: Until current emperor ascended throne, summoned fangshi Tang Du, divided their heaven divisions;
translations.idiomatic: Until the current emperor ascended the throne, he summoned the fangshi Tang Du, who divided the heaven divisions;

sentences.zh: 而巴落下閎運算轉歷，然後日辰之度與夏正同。

translations.literal: And Bafall Xiaohong operated calculated rotating calendar, then sun day degrees with Xia calendar same.
translations.idiomatic: And Bafall Xiaohong operated and calculated the rotating calendar, then the sun and day's degrees were the same as the Xia calendar.

translations.literal: Thereupon changed yuan, changed official titles, sealed Taishan.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon he changed the yuan, changed official titles, and sealed Taishan.

sentences.zh: 因詔御史曰：「乃者，有司言星度之未定也，廣延宣問，以理星度，未能詹也。

translations.literal: Therefore commanded Censor said: "Formerly, officials spoke star degrees not yet settled also, broadly extended announced asked, to reason star degrees, not able reach also."
translations.idiomatic: Therefore he commanded the Censor saying: 'Formerly the officials said the star degrees were not yet settled. Broadly extending and announcing to ask, to reason about star degrees, we have not been able to reach them.'

sentences.zh: 蓋聞昔者黃帝合而不死，名察度驗，定清濁，起五部，建氣物分數。

translations.literal: Indeed heard formerly Yellow Emperor united and not died, named examined degree verified, settled clear turbid, raised five divisions, established qi things divisions numbers.
translations.idiomatic: Indeed I have heard that formerly the Yellow Emperor united and did not die, named and examined degrees verified, settled clear and turbid, raised the five divisions, established qi and things' division numbers.

translations.literal: Yet indeed still remote.
translations.idiomatic: Yet indeed it is still too remote.

translations.literal: Documents lacking music relaxed, I greatly pity there.
translations.idiomatic: Documents are lacking and music is relaxed, I greatly pity this.

sentences.zh: 朕唯未能循明也，紬績日分，率應水德之勝。

translations.literal: I only have not been able to follow the bright way, continuing and refining the daily divisions, generally responding to the water virtue's victory.
translations.idiomatic: I alone have not been able to follow the enlightened way, but I continue and refine the daily divisions, generally responding to the victory of the water virtue.

sentences.zh: 今日順夏至，黃鐘為宮，林鐘為徵，太蔟為商，南呂為羽，姑洗為角。

translations.literal: Today follow summer solstice, Huangzhong as palace, Linzhong as zheng, Tai Cu as shang, Nan Lü as yu, Gu Xi as jiao.
translations.idiomatic: Today following the summer solstice: Huangzhong as palace, Linzhong as zheng, Tai Cu as shang, Nan Lü as yu, Gu Xi as jiao.

sentences.zh: 自是以後，氣復正，羽聲復清，名復正變，以至子日當冬至，則陰陽離合之道行焉。

translations.literal: From this after, qi again correct, yu sound again clear, names again correct changes, until zi day when winter solstice, then yin yang separate combine way proceeds there.
translations.idiomatic: From this time after, qi is again correct, yu sound is again clear, names are again correct changes, until the zi day meets the winter solstice, then the yin yang separate and combine way proceeds there.

sentences.zh: 十一月甲子朔旦冬至已詹，其更以七年為太初元年。

translations.literal: Eleventh month Jiazi new moon dawn winter solstice already reached, their change with seventh year as Tai Chu first year.
translations.idiomatic: The eleventh month, Jiazi, new moon dawn winter solstice has already been reached. They changed to make the seventh year Tai Chu's first year.

sentences.zh: 年名『焉逢攝提格』，月名『畢聚』，日得甲子，夜半朔旦冬至。」

translations.literal: Year named 'Yanfeng Shetige', month named 'Biju', day got Jiazi, midnight new moon dawn winter solstice."
translations.idiomatic: Year named 'Yanfeng Shetige', month named 'Biju', day got Jiazi, midnight new moon dawn winter solstice."

sentences.zh: 歷術甲子篇太初元年，歲名「焉逢攝提格」，月名「畢聚」，日得甲子，夜半朔旦冬至。

translations.literal: Calendar method Jiazi chapter Tai Chu first year, year named "Yanfeng Shetige", month named "Biju", day got Jiazi, midnight new moon dawn winter solstice.
translations.idiomatic: Calendar method Jiazi chapter, Tai Chu first year, year named 'Yanfeng Shetige', month named 'Biju', day got Jiazi, midnight new moon dawn winter solstice.

sentences.zh: 正北十二無大餘，無小餘；

translations.literal: North twelve no large remainder, no small remainder;
translations.idiomatic: North twelve: no large remainder, no small remainder;

translations.literal: No large remainder, no small remainder;
translations.idiomatic: No large remainder, no small remainder;

translations.literal: Yanfeng Shetige Tai Chu first year.
translations.idiomatic: Yanfeng Shetige, Tai Chu first year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘五十四，小餘三百四十八；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty four, small remainder three hundred forty eight;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder fifty-four, small remainder three hundred forty-eight;

translations.literal: Large remainder five, small remainder eight;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder five, small remainder eight;

translations.literal: Duameng Dan E second year.
translations.idiomatic: Duameng Dan E, second year.

sentences.zh: 閏十三大餘四十八，小餘六百九十六；

translations.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty eight, small remainder six hundred ninety six;
translations.idiomatic: Intercalary thirteen: large remainder forty-eight, small remainder six hundred ninety-six;

translations.literal: Large remainder ten, small remainder sixteen;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder ten, small remainder sixteen;

translations.literal: You Zhao Zhi Xu third year.
translations.idiomatic: You Zhao Zhi Xu, third year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘十二，小餘六百三；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder twelve, small remainder six hundred three;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder twelve, small remainder six hundred three;

translations.literal: Large remainder fifteen, small remainder twenty four;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder fifteen, small remainder twenty-four;

translations.literal: Qiang Wu Da Huang Luo fourth year.
translations.idiomatic: Qiang Wu Da Huang Luo, fourth year.

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder seven, small remainder eleven;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder seven, small remainder eleven;

translations.literal: Large remainder twenty one, no small remainder;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder twenty-one, no small remainder;

translations.literal: Tu Wei Dun Zang Tian Han first year.
translations.idiomatic: Tu Wei Dun Zang, Tian Han first year.

sentences.zh: 閏十三大餘一，小餘三百五十九；

translations.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder one, small remainder three hundred fifty nine;
translations.idiomatic: Intercalary thirteen: large remainder one, small remainder three hundred fifty-nine;

translations.literal: Large remainder twenty six, small remainder eight;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder twenty-six, small remainder eight;

translations.literal: Zhu Li Xie Qiao second year.
translations.idiomatic: Zhu Li Xie Qiao, second year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘二十五，小餘二百六十六；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty five, small remainder two hundred sixty six;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder twenty-five, small remainder two hundred sixty-six;

translations.literal: Large remainder thirty one, small remainder sixteen;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder thirty-one, small remainder sixteen;

translations.literal: Shang Heng Dun Tan third year.
translations.idiomatic: Shang Heng Dun Tan, third year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘十九，小餘六百一十四；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder nineteen, small remainder six hundred fourteen;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder nineteen, small remainder six hundred fourteen;

sentences.zh: 大餘三十六，小餘二十四；

translations.literal: Large remainder thirty six, small remainder twenty four;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder thirty-six, small remainder twenty-four;

translations.literal: Zhao Yang Zuo E fourth year.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Yang Zuo E, fourth year.

sentences.zh: 閏十三大餘十四，小餘二十二；

translations.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder fourteen, small remainder twenty two;
translations.idiomatic: Intercalary thirteen: large remainder fourteen, small remainder twenty-two;

translations.literal: Large remainder forty two, no small remainder;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder forty-two, no small remainder;

translations.literal: Heng Ai Yan Mao Tai Shi first year.
translations.idiomatic: Heng Ai Yan Mao, Tai Shi first year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘三十七，小餘八百六十九；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty seven, small remainder eight hundred sixty nine;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder thirty-seven, small remainder eight hundred sixty-nine;

translations.literal: Large remainder forty seven, small remainder eight;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder forty-seven, small remainder eight;

translations.literal: Shang Zhang Da Yuan Xian second year.
translations.idiomatic: Shang Zhang Da Yuan Xian, second year.

sentences.zh: 閏十三大餘三十二，小餘二百七十七；

translations.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty two, small remainder two hundred seventy seven;
translations.idiomatic: Intercalary thirteen: large remainder thirty-two, small remainder two hundred seventy-seven;

sentences.zh: 大餘五十二，小餘一十六；

translations.literal: Large remainder fifty two, small remainder sixteen;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder fifty-two, small remainder sixteen;

translations.literal: Yanfeng Kun Dun third year.
translations.idiomatic: Yanfeng Kun Dun, third year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘五十六，小餘一百八十四；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty six, small remainder one hundred eighty four;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder fifty-six, small remainder one hundred eighty-four;

sentences.zh: 大餘五十七，小餘二十四；

translations.literal: Large remainder fifty seven, small remainder twenty four;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder fifty-seven, small remainder twenty-four;

translations.literal: Duameng Chi Fen Ruo fourth year.
translations.idiomatic: Duameng Chi Fen Ruo, fourth year.

sentences.zh: 十二大餘五十，小餘五百三十二；

translations.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty, small remainder five hundred thirty two;
translations.idiomatic: Twelve: large remainder fifty, small remainder five hundred thirty-two;

translations.literal: Large remainder three, no small remainder;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder three, no small remainder;

translations.literal: You Zhao Shetige Zheng He first year.
translations.idiomatic: You Zhao Shetige, Zheng He first year.

sentences.zh: 閏十三大餘四十四，小餘八百八十；

translations.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty four, small remainder eight hundred eighty;
translations.idiomatic: Intercalary thirteen: large remainder forty-four, small remainder eight hundred eighty;

translations.literal: Large remainder eight, small remainder eight;
translations.idiomatic: Large remainder eight, small remainder eight;

translations.literal: Right calendar book: large remainder ones, sun also.
translations.idiomatic: The calendar book to the right: large remainders are the sun.

translations.literal: Small remainder ones, moon also.
translations.idiomatic: Small remainders are the moon.

translations.literal: Duanzhan Meng are year names.
translations.idiomatic: Duānzhān Méng are year designations.

sentences.zh: 支：丑名赤奮若，寅名攝提格。

translations.literal: Branches: Chou named Chi Fen Ruo, Yin named Shetige.
translations.idiomatic: Branches: Chou is named Chi Fen Ruo, Yin is named Shetige.

translations.literal: Stems: Bing named You Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Stems: Bing is named You Zhao.

translations.literal: North, winter solstice adds zi time;
translations.idiomatic: North: winter solstice adds zi hour;

translations.literal: West, adds you time;
translations.idiomatic: West: adds you hour;

translations.literal: South, adds wu time;
translations.idiomatic: South: adds wu hour;

translations.literal: East, adds mao time.
translations.idiomatic: East: adds mao hour.
